title: I am 16,is it too late to learn writing songs and singing? - Quora

response.answer_text: no it's not too late, I started early, I began writing songs when i was 17 and I started singing when i was 14 but it's never too late there are people who started in their 30's even 40's, so yeah never too late.
No it’s never too late. Hard work and passion! Many singers did not make it until their late adult life. Consider finding a singing tutor, if you can’t afford it follow YouTube videos.
